item.description: AKA Malevolence Daria ’s weapon. Usually surrounded by maddening mists of red.
Gods Hoar Players Daria Ex-Players Naberus

item.title: Dominus Oraculum
item.description: Book made out of human flesh found by Naberus One shall come and 3 shall hide and all dwarves shall kneel when she does arise._ Beware the fox of pure intention, you will be betrayed. Though he knows not the darkness his actions serve._ The wolf shall return and with him rip the realm atwain. Two must become one or else one shall become two.

item.title: Memes
item.description: List of Memes Sexy Ham. Illusion used by a legendary hedgehog bard to distract animals. “Does a x hit” - Used by [[Geralt of Rivania]] whenever he rolled a “2” and it came out as 30 to hit. But but but what about the accent

item.title: Naberus
item.description: Class Eldrich Knight - Warforge Notes Obsessed with dick Believes he is still an elf

item.title: Unknowns
item.description: Black Seal with a monkey on the letter from the church in [[Innadel]] SOLVED - [[Lady Xiao]] seal Octopus Tattoo, [[Winter]] has a Octopus tattoo same as the guards mercanarys from [[Innadel]]
